text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: —— So, do you think these will help?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Yes, thank you very much. 
Would you mind if I borrowed 
them for a short time?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Not at all. …Still, I'm amazed that you're 
studying material from the next year.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
It is nothing worthy of praise. 
In order to efficiently deepen my 
understanding of—

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…… What's wrong? 
Are some parts I wrote hard to understand?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I admire your assiduousness in studying and 
wish to follow your example. Please allow me 
to repay this favor someday.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
That's okay, I don't need any repayment. 
I'm happy just knowing they're helpful to you.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
…… Is that so. 
…… Thank you very much.
